posts.post_content:
Greetings! Offered for sale is a 1911 T201 Mecca Cigarettes McGinnity/McCarty SGC 50. Price is SOLD shipped. Price includes shipping (tracking and insurance is extra) PM or post if interested and thanks for looking.
Jeff

Take care
